name: Looper
description: A feature-rich looper based on the disting EX algorithm, extended with crossfades, envelopes, clock synchronization, MIDI clock generation, and a layer system for undo/redo.

specifications.name: Max time
specifications.description: The maximum total loop time (in seconds), shared across all loops.

parameters.name: Target loop
parameters.description: Selects the loop(s) affected by commands.

parameters.name: Record
parameters.description: Record/Overdub command trigger.

parameters.name: Play
parameters.description: Play/Pause/Mute/Retrigger command trigger.

parameters.name: Retrigger
parameters.description: Retrigger command trigger.

parameters.name: Undo
parameters.description: Undo command trigger (moves to previous layer).

parameters.name: Redo
parameters.description: Redo command trigger (moves to next layer).

parameters.name: Target 1
parameters.description: Target loop 1 selection trigger.

parameters.name: Target 2
parameters.description: Target loop 2 selection trigger.

parameters.name: Target 3
parameters.description: Target loop 3 selection trigger.

parameters.name: Target 4
parameters.description: Target loop 4 selection trigger.

parameters.name: Target next
parameters.description: Target next loop command trigger (on release). Also has long hold function.

parameters.name: Stop all
parameters.description: Stop all command trigger.

parameters.name: Next hold time
parameters.description: Hold time for 'Target next' long press function.

parameters.name: Record hold time
parameters.description: Hold time for 'Record'/'Overdub' command as alternative to double-tap.

parameters.name: Crossfade
parameters.description: Crossfade time for smooth looping.

parameters.name: Envelope attack
parameters.description: Attack time for loop start/stop envelope.

parameters.name: Envelope decay
parameters.description: Decay time for loop start/stop envelope.

parameters.name: Overdub attack
parameters.description: Attack time for overdub start/end envelope.

parameters.name: Overdub decay
parameters.description: Decay time for overdub start/end envelope.

parameters.name: Overdub fade
parameters.description: Amount previous material fades during overdub (-60dB is silence).

parameters.name: Input gain
parameters.description: Gain applied to the input signal.

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: Output level of the loop.

parameters.name: Pan
parameters.description: Stereo panning of the loop output.

parameters.name: Reverse
parameters.description: Plays the loop in reverse.

parameters.name: Half speed
parameters.description: Plays the loop at half speed (one octave down).

parameters.name: Pause/mute
parameters.description: Action performed when 'Play' is pressed while playing.

parameters.name: Channels
parameters.description: Sets the loop as mono or stereo (affects max length).

parameters.name: Bit depth
parameters.description: Recording bit depth (affects max length and potential clipping).

parameters.name: Input L
parameters.description: Left/Mono input bus.

parameters.name: Input R
parameters.description: Right input bus (0=None for mono).

parameters.name: Output L
parameters.description: Left/Mono output bus.

parameters.name: Output R
parameters.description: Right output bus (0=None for mono).

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: Output mode (Add/Replace).

parameters.name: Clock source
parameters.description: Source for clock synchronization.

parameters.name: Clock input
parameters.description: Input bus for analogue clock sync.

parameters.name: Lock range
parameters.description: Time window around clock for automatic retriggering.

parameters.name: Bypass clock
parameters.description: Temporarily ignore clock sync for commands.

parameters.name: MIDI transport
parameters.description: Sync start/stop with MIDI transport messages.

parameters.name: PPQN (out)
parameters.description: Pulses per quarter note for generated clock output.

parameters.name: 1/4 notes (out)
parameters.description: Number of quarter notes per loop for clock generation.

parameters.name: Clock output
parameters.description: Output bus for generated clock.

parameters.name: Clock out mode
parameters.description: Output mode for generated clock.

parameters.name: Minimum layers
parameters.description: Reserve memory for minimum number of layers (0=disabled, 1=single layer, max 16). Affects max loop length.

parameters.name: Current layer
parameters.description: Currently active layer.

parameters.name: Layer fade
parameters.description: Crossfade time when switching layers.

parameters.name: Only record targets
parameters.description: If on, audio is only recorded/overdubbed into target loops.

parameters.name: Record Note
parameters.description: MIDI note number for Record/Overdub command.

parameters.name: Play Note
parameters.description: MIDI note number for Play/Pause/Mute/Retrigger command.
